attributes.action: financial support hospitality industry to avoid job losses
attributes.additional_details: Inject cash into hotel businesses so there are no job losses
attributes.background: Support Financially hospitality industry during this unprecedented times

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302162

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
